program.name: Test-Pod
program.uninstall:
_installsitearch=$(${SB_VAR_PERL}/bin/perl -e \ 'use Config; print $Config{"installsitearch"} . "\n";')
cat ${_installsitearch}/auto/Test/Pod/.packlist |\ while read _file; do rm ${_file}
_dir=$(dirname ${_file}) test -d ${_dir} && rmdir ${_dir} 2>/dev/null done
rm ${_installsitearch}/auto/Test/Pod/.packlist rmdir ${_installsitearch}/auto/Test/Pod rmdir ${_installsitearch}/auto/Test 2>/dev/null
${SB_PATH_SED} -i -e "\ /head2.*L<Test::Pod|/,/back/ { g N d }" ${_installsitearch}/perllocal.pod
